row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DMTOOL.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &COMMAND# = 'java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm DeleteEnvironmentTargetRelation -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#"'
:IF &UC4RB_RM_TARGET# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = '&COMMAND# -t "&UC4RB_RM_TARGET#"' :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_ENV_NAME# NE "" : SET &COMMAND# = '&COMMAND# -e "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_NAME#"' :ENDIF
&COMMAND#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode !
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
